name: Battle Brawler
originalText: As long as you control a red or white permanent, Battle Brawler gets +1/+0 and has first strike.

rulings.text: If Battle Brawler assigns combat damage during the first combat damage step, and then it loses first strike before the second combat damage step (perhaps because you no longer control a red or white permanent), it won’t assign combat damage again in the second combat damage step.

text: As long as you control a red or white permanent, Battle Brawler gets +1/+0 and has first strike.
